description:
It’s a feeding frenzy as Rishido’s Serket devours Jonouchi’s monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution!  How can Jonouchi defeat Serket when it ingests Jonouchi’s monsters whenever they’re summoned on to the field?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ra no Tsubasajinryuu o Shoukan Seyo
Summon the Winged Dragon of Ra
ラーの翼神竜を召喚せよ
